timeline.title: Software Engineer (GRA)
timeline.description: Built an end-to-end pipeline to optimize DSSAT-based crop simulations by integrating weather (NASA POWER, OpenMeteo), soil, and AI-driven RAG-based interfaces. Delivered scalable geospatial analysis and LLM-powered crop intelligence tools using HPC infrastructure.
achievements: Enhanced agricultural modeling systems (Pythia & DSSAT) by developing automated pipelines to retrieve, clean, and feed satellite-derived climate and soil data, eliminating manual file downloads and reducing model setup time by 70%.

Integrated weather data from NASA POWER (S3 + Zarr format) and OpenMeteo API, transforming multi-temporal spatial data into ICASA-compatible files using geospatial processing and Python-based ETL pipelines.

Built a parallelized processing mechanism using Python multiprocessing and vectorized NumPy/Pandas operations to process high-resolution geospatial data per grid cell, improving runtime performance by 5x on dense coordinate datasets.
Leveraged UF HyperGator high-performance computing resources to accelerate climate data extraction and simulation runs across large-scale experimental regions.

Designed a modular framework for AI-based crop insights, integrating RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and MCP with OpenAI GPT APIs, enabling natural language access to spatial crop forecasts and agronomic recommendations.

Collaborated with cross-disciplinary teams (agronomy, computer science, and data science) to ensure domain-aligned, reproducible, and scalable research workflows using Docker, Git, and Jupyter Notebooks.

timeline.title: Masters in Computer and Information Science and Engineering
timeline.description: Focused on Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science and Algorithms with emphasis on problem-solving and analytical thinking.
achievements: Maintaining a First Class Honours (GPA: 4.0/4.0).
Designed and built GatorCan, a Full-stack educational platform for seamless course management and collaboration.
Developed an Object Oriented version of Pascal Programming language

timeline.title: Backend Developer
timeline.description: Developed and owned scalable microservices using Java, Spring Boot, and AWS, powering critical workflows for 1,000+ users. Achieved significant performance gains via Redis caching, efficient DB queries, and Kafka-based async processing. Secured APIs with JWT/OAuth2, followed TDD and CI/CD best practices using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Docker. Led full-cycle backend delivery with AWS ECS, RDS, and CloudWatch for resilient, observable deployments.
achievements: Designed and owned highly available microservices using Java and Spring Boot, powering core operational workflows for 1,000+ internal users; reduced latency by 40% via caching and efficient query design.
Integrated Apache Kafka to enable asynchronous event processing, improving throughput by 35%.
Applied Redis caching to reduce DB read latency by 90%, improving API response times during peak load.
Built secure REST APIs with JWT and OAuth2 authentication, applying SOLID principles and layered architecture
Led CI/CD pipeline setup using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Docker; reduced deployment time by 80%
Followed TDD with JUnit, Mockito, and REST-assured to ensure >90% test coverage
Participated in Agile/XP sprints, pair programming, and code reviews across distributed teams

Led design and implementation of end-to-end backend workflows using AWS ECS, RDS, and Lambda, improving system resilience & reducing failure recovery time by 60%; followed Amazon's Operational Excellence principles with dashboards, alarms, rollbacks
Deployed microservices to AWS ECS with RDS (Aurora Postgres) backend and configured CloudWatch alerts

timeline.title: Automation Developer
timeline.description: Engineered a chatbot and automation suite using Power Automate, Flask, and Python, reducing downtime by 10% and saving 800+ hours annually through cross-platform task automation. Enhanced system performance by 93% via multithreaded DB optimization and secured access with a custom Dataverse-based authorization framework, cutting admin overhead by 20%.
achievements: Developed and deployed a chatbot solution leveraging Power Automate (PVA) and Flask REST API to automate key processes, demonstrating strong object-oriented programming skills while reducing downtime by 10%

Automated repetitive tasks across mainframes, Windows, web applications, and databases using Python and Shell scripting, saving 800+ hours annually and improving team productivity by 20% through effective collaboration with stakeholders

Built a custom authorization mechanism with Dataverse and Python to manage secure, role-based access across applications, incorporating user feedback to refine system design and reducing administrative overhead by 20%

Optimized database operations by implementing multithreading techniques, reducing processing times by 93% (from 240 sec. to 16 sec.) and proactively applying best practices to enhance system efficiency and reliability

timeline.title: Fullstack Developer
timeline.description: Built a secure, real-time order tracking portal that reduced response time by 90%, automated 3 key workflows, and saved 720+ hours annually while cutting support tickets by 40%.
achievements: Designed and developed a web-based order tracking portal using React.js, Node.js, Express.js and MS SQL, collaborating closely with teammates to integrate user requirements and reduce response time by 90%, saving 500 hours annually
Integrated role-based authorization and security protocols to ensure secure login and compliance, applying internal best practices to minimize incidents by 30% and enhance system reliability

Optimized order tracking workflows by automating manual processes, decoupling dependency on support tickets by 40%, and saving 200 hours annually, thereby delivering customer-focused software solutions

timeline.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
timeline.company: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
timeline.description: Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals, software engineering, and modern programming paradigms.
achievements: Graduated with First Class Honours (CGPA: 8.7/10)
Designed and built apniPharmacy, a platform to collect and provide unused medicines to NGOs which then reaches to the people in need
Lead a team of 5 to organize drones designing and building workshop with IIT Kanpur startup ‚ÄúPi Drones‚Äù, which was first of its kind, in the campus.
Lead a team of 10 to organize Codezilla, an inter-college coding hackathon.
Led a team of 20 volunteers to organize hospitality services for over 600+ attendees during the Universal Human Values and Professional Ethics Conference.
